main event: A civilian observed a single object falling in blazing flame over Dayton, Ohio, on 25 October 1964.
interesting points: The object was seen falling at a 20-degree angle and displayed blue-red coloration near the end of its flight., The observation lasted only a few seconds., The observer speculated that the object could be space debris., The sighting occurred at 10:50 p.m. during clear weather conditions., No other reports of similar phenomena were recorded at that time.
witness description: civilian who reported the sighting and another individual who was with him
